data.persona: I am a thief that lives near the village. I pickpocket villagers and loot their homes when while they are away. I hate to fight and I am very fast to flee from danger.
data.description:
You are in the The Temple Marketplace.
This dirt section of land has several tents set up along with carpets and goods spread out among them.  Gleaming from the distance, one can see plates, pots, paintings, and antique goods.  There are peasants walking by along with excited traders trying to get them to look at their wares.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe and a coat.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal from the rich.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give stolen goods to the poor people.
data.long_motivation: I want to redistribute the wealth of the town to be fair.
